history.proof: intros. split. - intros H. split. + intros x H'. apply H. apply Union_introl. apply H'. + intros x H'. apply H. apply Union_intror. apply H'. - intros [HP HQ] x H'. apply Union_ind with (B:=P) (C:=Q). + intros x' HP'. apply HP. apply HP'. + intros x' HQ'. apply HQ. apply HQ'. + apply H'.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type

Goal:
forall P Q R : Ensemble A, Included (Union A P Q) R <-> Included P R /\ Included Q R

Premises:
Fin.R : forall n : nat, Fin.t ?m -> Fin.t (n + ?m) where ?m : [A : Type |- nat]
Included = fun (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) => forall x : U, In U B x -> In U C x : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Prop Argument U is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
Ensemble = fun U : Type => U -> Prop : Type -> Type Argument scope is [type_scope]
Record Q : Set := Qmake { Qnum : BinNums.Z; Qden : BinNums.positive } For Qmake: Argument scopes are [Z_scope positive_scope]
Union : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Ensemble U
Union_assoc : forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Same_set (Union A (Union A P Q) R) (Union A P (Union A Q R))
Intersection_Union_distr_r : forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Same_set (Intersection A P (Union A Q R)) (Union A (Intersection A P Q) (Intersection A P R))
Intersection_assoc : forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Same_set (Intersection A (Intersection A P Q) R) (Intersection A P (Intersection A Q R))
Union_comm : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Same_set (Union A P Q) (Union A Q P)
Intersection_Union_distr_l : forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Same_set (Intersection A (Union A Q R) P) (Union A (Intersection A Q P) (Intersection A R P))
Disjoint_spec : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Disjoint A P Q < -> (forall x : A, P x -> Q x -> False)
Intersection_spec : forall (A : Type) (v : A) (P Q : Ensemble A), Intersection A P Q v < -> P v /\ Q v
Same_set_spec : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Same_set P Q < -> pointwise_relation A iff P Q
Intersection_comm : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Same_set (Intersection A P Q) (Intersection A Q P)
Included_Full_set : forall (A : Type) (P : Ensemble A), Included P (Full_set A)
Union_spec : forall (A : Type) (v : A) (P Q : Ensemble A), Union A P Q v < -> P v \/ Q v
Intersection_Complement : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Same_set (Intersection A (Complement A P) (Complement A Q)) (Complement A (Union A P Q))
Included_Empty : forall (U : Type) (A : Ensemble U), Included (Empty_set U) A
Same_set = fun (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) => Included B C /\ Included C B : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Prop Argument U is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
Strict_Included_intro : forall (U : Type) (X Y : Ensemble U), Included X Y /\ X <> Y -> Strict_Included U X Y
Included_proper : forall V : Type, Proper (Same_set ==> Same_set ==> iff) Included
Forall_app_iff : forall (P : ?A -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list ?A), List.Forall P (l1 ++ l2) < -> List.Forall P l1 /\ List.Forall P l2 where ?A : [A : Type |- Type]
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)%list) -> forall l : list A, P l
Ring_polynom.PEeval : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (BinNums.N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> list R -> Ring_polynom.PExpr C -> R
Field_theory.PCond : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (BinNums.N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> list R -> list (Ring_polynom.PExpr C) -> Prop
OrderedRing.SORle_wd : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> forall y1 y2 : R, req y1 y2 -> rle x1 y1 < -> rle x2 y2
OrderedRing.SORlt_trichotomy : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall n m : R, rlt n m \/ req n m \/ rlt m n
List.Forall2_cons : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> List.Forall2 R l l' -> List.Forall2 R (x :: l) (y :: l')
Inductive Forall2 (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) : list A -> list B -> Prop := Forall2_nil : List.Forall2 R nil nil | Forall2_cons : forall (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> List.Forall2 R l l' -> List.Forall2 R (x :: l) (y :: l') For Forall2: Arguments A, B are implicit For Forall2_nil: Arguments A, B are implicit For Forall2_cons: Arguments A, B, R, l, l' are implicit For Forall2: Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope list_scope list_scope] For Forall2_nil: Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope] For Forall2_cons: Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope _ _ list_scope list_scope _ _]
OrderedRing.SORtimes_wd : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> forall y1 y2 : R, req y1 y2 -> req (rtimes x1 y1) (rtimes x2 y2)
Field_theory.PCond_app : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (C : Type) (phi : C -> R) (Cpow : Type) (Cp_phi : BinNums.N -> Cpow) (rpow : R -> Cpow -> R) (l : list R) (l1 l2 : list (Ring_polynom.PExpr C)), Field_theory.PCond rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req phi Cp_phi rpow l (l1 ++ l2) < -> Field_theory.PCond rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req phi Cp_phi rpow l l1 /\ Field_theory.PCond rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req phi Cp_phi rpow l l2
Field_theory.PCond_cons : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (C : Type) (phi : C -> R) (Cpow : Type) (Cp_phi : BinNums.N -> Cpow) (rpow : R -> Cpow -> R) (l : list R) (a : Ring_polynom.PExpr C) (l1 : list (Ring_polynom.PExpr C)), Field_theory.PCond rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req phi Cp_phi rpow l (a :: l1) < -> ~ req (Ring_polynom.PEeval rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp phi Cp_phi rpow l a) rO /\ Field_theory.PCond rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req phi Cp_phi rpow l l1
List.Forall2_nil : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop), List.Forall2 R nil nil
BinNums.positive_ind : forall P : BinNums.positive -> Prop, (forall p : BinNums.positive, P p -> P (BinNums.xI p)) -> (forall p : BinNums.positive, P p -> P (BinNums.xO p)) -> P BinNums.xH -> forall p : BinNums.positive, P p
List.Forall_cons : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> List.Forall P l -> List.Forall P (x :: l)
ssrbool.equivalence_relP_in : forall (T : Type) (R : ssrbool.rel T) (A : ssrbool.pred T), ssrbool.prop_in3 (ssrbool.mem A) (P:=fun x y z : T => (is_true (R z z) * (is_true (R x y) -> R x z = R y z))%type) (ssrbool.inPhantom (ssrbool.equivalence_rel (T:=T) R)) <-> ssrbool.prop_in1 (ssrbool.mem A) (P:=fun x : T => is_true (R x x)) (ssrbool.inPhantom (ssrbool.reflexive (T:=T) R)) /\ ssrbool.prop_in2 (ssrbool.mem A) (P:=fun x y : T => is_true (R x y) -> ssrbool.prop_in1 (ssrbool.mem A) (P:=fun x0 : T => R x x0 = R y x0) (ssrbool.inPhantom (ssrfun.eqfun (R x) (R y)))) (...
Inductive Forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := Forall_nil : List.Forall P nil | Forall_cons : forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> List.Forall P l -> List.Forall P (x :: l) For Forall: Argument A is implicit For Forall_nil: Argument A is implicit For Forall_cons: Arguments A, P, l are implicit For Forall: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope list_scope] For Forall_nil: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope] For Forall_cons: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _ list_scope _ _]
List.Forall_nil : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), List.Forall P nil
ssrbool.elimTF : forall (P : Prop) (b c : bool), Bool.reflect P b -> b = c -> if c then P else ~ P
ssrbool.introT : forall (P : Prop) (b : bool), Bool.reflect P b -> P -> is_true b
Record ring_theory (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) : Prop := mk_rt { Radd_0_l : forall x : R, req (radd rO x) x; Radd_comm : forall x y : R, req (radd x y) (radd y x); Radd_assoc : forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z); Rmul_1_l : forall x : R, req (rmul rI x) x; Rmul_comm : forall x y : R, req (rmul x y) (rmul y x); Rmul_assoc : forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul x y) z); Rdistr_l : forall x y z : R, req (rmul (radd x y) z) (radd (rmul x z) (rmul...
Union_ind : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : U -> Prop), (forall x : U, In U B x -> P x) -> (forall x : U, In U C x -> P x) -> forall u : U, Union U B C u -> P u
Union_sind : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : U -> SProp), (forall x : U, In U B x -> P x) -> (forall x : U, In U C x -> P x) -> forall u : U, Union U B C u -> P u
ssrbool.prop_in1 : forall T1 : Type, ssrbool.mem_pred T1 -> forall P : T1 -> Prop, ssreflect.phantom Prop (forall x : T1, P x) -> Prop
Decidable.decidable = fun P : Prop => P \/ ~ P : Prop -> Prop Argument scope is [type_scope]

```coq
intros A P Q R.
split.
- intros H. split.
  + intros x H'. apply H. apply Union_introl. apply H'.
  + intros x H'. apply H. apply Union_intror. apply H'.
- intros [HP HQ] x H'. apply Union_ind with (B:=P) (C:=Q).
  + intros x' HP'. apply HP. apply HP'.
  + intros x' HQ'. apply HQ. apply HQ'.
  + apply H'.
Qed.```

original: intros A P Q R. split. - intros H. split. + intros x H'. apply H. apply Union_introl. apply H'. + intros x H'. apply H. apply Union_intror. apply H'. - intros [HP HQ] x H'. apply Union_ind with (B:=P) (C:=Q). + intros x' HP'. apply HP. apply HP'. + intros x' HQ'. apply HQ. apply HQ'. + apply H'.
